skills.title: Wordpress
skills.description: Custom theme & plugin development, WooCommerce integration, responsive design and performance optimization, and security hardening for scalable, SEO-friendly websites.

skills.title: QA
skills.description: Ensure software quality through systematic testing—identifying bugs, improving performance, and safeguarding user experience before release.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: User-centered interfaces, wireframing & prototyping. Focus on usability, accessibility & clean aesthetics.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Custom, responsive websites with clean code, CMS integration, and dynamic interactions—built visually in Webflow.

portfolio.title: Memari
portfolio.description: WordPress site built with Elementor & Royal Addons, featuring responsive Figma design. Used CPT UI + ACF for dynamic content, MetForms for forms, and Polylang for multilingual support.

portfolio.title: Tagespflege St. Agnes GmbH
portfolio.description: WordPress site for Seligenstadt elderly day care (2026) built with Elementor PRO, MetForm, and CCM19 for GDPR compliance.

portfolio.title: Nice Move
portfolio.description: Built a clean, responsive website for Nice Move using Webflow. Utilized its visual designer for pixel-perfect layouts, responsive controls for all devices, CMS for easy content updates, and interactions to enhance user experience. The site is fast, secure, and SEO-friendly.

portfolio.title: Smart Wave
portfolio.description: Built Smartwave's responsive website with Webflow, featuring pixel-perfect design, smooth animations, and intuitive CMS for optimal cross-device UX.

portfolio.title: Mobiler Pflegedienst St. Agnes
portfolio.description: Built a WordPress site for Mobiler Pflegedienst St. Agnes (German mobile nursing/day care) using Elementor, MetForm, and GDPR/security plugins. Showcases services and 2026 facility launch.

portfolio.title: Kahlgrunder Pflegedienst GmbH
portfolio.description: Built with Elementor for responsive design, MetForm for contact forms, and Complianz/CCM19 for GDPR compliance. Secured with Really Simple SSL for safe browsing.

portfolio.title: Beam Pro
portfolio.description: WordPress site built with Elementor & Royal Addons, featuring responsive Figma design. Used CPT UI + ACF for dynamic content, MetForms for forms, and MetTranslate for translation.
